fields.name: Features:
fields.value:
Exactly two different Color Primary roles will always spawn.
Color Achromatic roles will never spawn in the starting rolelist. Dead Colors will become 3587: White if they died during the day, and 3588: Black if they died at night.
Factional chat
No factional kill
If a Color Primary member dies, a Color Composite member will become that role if possible. If none are available, the next player to be Colored will immediately become that role.
Coloring a player turns them into a Color role based on what members Colored them.
Only one player may be Colored at a time, and Coloring a player cannot occur two nights in a row. Also, exactly two players must Color the same player for the Coloring to succeed.
If an evil faction member is Colored, they instead die and become Black (3588). This does not count as a successful Coloring.
